website_summaries.verdict: Building on the advances of the previous games in the landmark Elder Scrolls series, the latest chapter, Skyrim, is the most detailed, immersive, and engrossing yet.
pros: Provides almost limitless options for playing, replaying

customer_reviews.title: It's a good game if you mod it
customer_reviews.text: It's a good game if you mod it... Which you shouldn't have to do. It's awesome that you can, but terrible that it's required. I get that a lot of people enjoy this game, and think it's really great that they do. But Bethesda was lazy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Still Great 9yrs Later
customer_reviews.text: Still the best fantasy game of the past decade. Mods keep it fresh and re-playable. Vanilla content + DLCs + Creation Club mods easily offer 100-150hrs of content to play through. Buy it on Steam though, don't buy this old PC physical copy unless you just want a cool collectible like I did, to display or keep or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: OldThings

customer_reviews.title: The game is fun in it's own way but not nearly as fun ...
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun in it's own way but not nearly as fun as Morrowind or Oblivion. In a lot of ways they have dumbed down the game to make it more appealing to a broader audience. One of the more frustrating things is the beginning of the game. It is fun to watch once, maybe twice, but you have to sit through it every time you create a new character. In previous games you could skip it but not this time around. There are more annoying aspects to the game but I do not wish to post any type of spoilers for those who decide to ignore the negatives and venture forth on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Activation Code Used
customer_reviews.text: I received the game and manual and bonus map. However, the activation code was used by a previous owner and i could not link it to my Steam account. This means that I cannot play the game. I will do a return if working activation code is not provided.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games a person can buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games a person can buy. If you are looking for a game to buy your son or daughter, then this is the one. You can sink hundreds of hours into the gameplay and it still feels fresh. There is an entire community of modders that add additions to the game that you can download. This means you can amplify the graphics if your computer is higher powered, and you can add more storyline content and sidequests to your heart's content. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: V. Doug Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best game, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever. Even after three years, this game is the best game ever made IMO. However, keep in mind this is a VERY COMPLEX game to master entirely, we ended up using many reference materials and charts, etc. to keep track of everything. It is a "cross-genre" game, meaning it is part FPS (first-person shooter, "first-person" refers to the camera view), part RPG (role-playing game), part action game. HUGE open world play - do what you want when you want to do it. Really needs SkyUI & Skyrim script extender (mods) to make the game interface nice. Problems? Search the UESP wiki for the solution. Fantastic scenery and gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: HalloweenWeed

customer_reviews.title: This Game Was the Reason I Stopped Playing Video Games
customer_reviews.text: After logging over 200 hours on this game, sadly, I had to ask myself what was I doing with my life. What was I creating by sitting at my computer disconnected from family, friends and social events. Having conversations with NPC's and accomplishing fictitious goals is ultimately less rewarding than the real thing. This is a great game however and if you long to disconnect from reality, sacrifice any kind of a social life, then I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cali T

customer_reviews.title: Play.  Crash.  Reboot.  Repeat.
customer_reviews.text: After playing this game for 20 minutes, my computer crashed to reboot. Now it does it all the time after adjusting the settings and making sure that my computer isn't overheating and check the CPS and all that jazz. I have above the minimum requirements required for this game. I have been searching for a fix on different websites, but to no avail. Anyways, other than the constant crashing and rebooting of my PC, this is a fun game with great graphics. I could loose myself in it for hours and not realize how much time has passed. It would get 5 stars if I could find a solution to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: CanOfTuna

customer_reviews.title: Rule Violation
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to enter the key for the download, it said the key had already been used by someone else. Yes, I did buy it pre-owned, but Amazon’s software ruleset states that the key for the game must be able to be used by the buyer, which clearly, it was not. I really wish I could give this negative five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cantelmo

customer_reviews.title: Skyrim is Good
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed playing Skyrim. It has good and bad points, but the good outweigh the bad. The graphics, gameplay, interacting, multiple quest options, and generally living life there instead of here are all really good. The only problem was all the glitches. I was riding my horse once cross country and it ran into a rock leading to many problems resulting in restarting the game. Some quests require going through a place several times because the first time the levers don't work and such. Still, I enjoy this game a lot. It can be a bit bloody so for prosperity's sake it would be good not to let children play.
customer_reviews.author: MaidenRoseHeart

customer_reviews.title: I might just play this game forever.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best game's I've ever played. I got this game when it was first released, and I *still* play it to this day. The PC version is great because all the mods available let it live on and on. My first playthrough was all vanilla gameplay because I wanted to experience it as it was meant to be, and I loved the story and the adventure of it. I really had an incredible time, and I would recommend this game to just about anyone who loves a good Western-style RPG, and particularly Elder Scrolls games.
customer_reviews.author: IlaynethFyr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game, life-like characters, make this game have its own real world.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly versatile game. The various characters that you can create, the personalities that you develop in them, and the choices that you make change the entire course of this game. You could play it again and again and it would always be different. Skyrim is the newest of a 5 part series that has long stood above the competition for quality and game play. The amazing graphics bring the gaming world to life as you are absorbed into the world of Skyrim. Caution! Don't get this game if you aren't ready to be hooked on the Elder Scrolls line of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Dad ^7

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game, great graphics, use MODS to make it even better for free!
customer_reviews.text: A game where you can explore a vast continent, fight dragons, thugs, magic-users, etc along with the ability to add MODS for free (via steam or nexusmods.com) to add even BETTER quality sounds, graphics, missions, quests, armors, weapons,items......it's gotta be THE best game for PC just in terms of quality and quantity on modding! Now sure, if you want me to be critical about it, I thought the storyline towards the end could have been better and would have wished for quicker ways out of some of the underground areas that one can get lost or tired running around in.
customer_reviews.author: Z1.amzn

customer_reviews.title: One of the greatest games of all time
customer_reviews.text: Still return to this even years later... very few games match the fun, variety, and scale this game provides. Still largely unrivaled even today.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: All fantasy gamers will own this game. It's practically required.
customer_reviews.text: When is an Elder Scrolls game not one of the best selling games around until the next one comes out? This is the quintessential open sandbox game where there are countless parallel story paths to take in any order at any time. There are so many skills and professions that you can build many different types of characters based on everything from magic to swords to poisons mixed from collected herbs. The story line and the graphics and depth in this game are astounding.
customer_reviews.author: UcMike

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t use
customer_reviews.text: Well we bought this and couldn’t even Install it because it’s still linked to another steam account . Super disappointed kid over here .
customer_reviews.author: Erica Marko

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it!
customer_reviews.text: Never buy a modern game for PC that's used. The physical game was fine when I got it, but the problem is you HAVE to register it online which meant it was useless to only the original owner. Don't do it!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest but it's all in personal taste
customer_reviews.text: Pre-ordered this game on the word of Bethesda that it could be played with OR without Steam only to receive the game and discover that it was Steam mandatory. Shame on you, Bethesda. The next time you want to make a game that grosses $650 million in one month, be honest and TELL us if the game is Steam dependent or not. It would be greatly appreciated. Good game, overall; typical for Elder Scrolls, just very disappointed in the platform.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoDreaming

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game
customer_reviews.text: I already owen this on steam but wanted the physical box, but it's one of the best games I have ever played. I would suggest modding as well, to make the game look like something from the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: There are many great features to this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Striking a near-perfect balance between grit and sensationalism, it takes viewers through a world marked by violence, double-dealing, and racial division, with an emphasis on the ambiguous morality and personal and familial baggage that come with a life lived between the straight world and the criminal one. The machinations of the characters and the twists of the plot are almost operatic, but the show remains rooted in the harsh realities of gangland. Comment
customer_reviews.author: William Carruth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Actually got bored after just a few hours. Doesn't seem right that you can already kill dragons at low levels within a few hours of gameplay either. Oblivion was far more entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Fabrice

customer_reviews.title: Absorbing
customer_reviews.text: I have been really enjoying playing this on my PC!!! It does have the occasional glitch--like once I got to a certain level, it seems like an empty dead dragon falls from the sky in Whiterun and lays there quivering. It kind of obscures your visual field but at least you can walk right through it and don't have to go around it or climb over!
customer_reviews.author: H. Catalfo

customer_reviews.title: Be sure it's brand new, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Was opened and used when received. Cannot download, was previously downloaded. Returned item for refund a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if youve got time to devote
customer_reviews.text: This is super addicting, even for people that are new to video games. Gameplay does require a mouse though. It's nearly impossible on a touchpad
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C.

customer_reviews.title: Late to Skyrim party, but having a blast
customer_reviews.text: PC role playing games don't get any better than this.... If you have waited and not purchased this game now is the time at a great reduced price... The Elder Scrolls series has always been a winner from their inception and Skyrim is no exception. You will need STEAM online to play the game, but this is not a bad thing as STEAM allows for easy game updating and other online goodies
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A Brock

customer_reviews.title: get this and have fun spending hours with the mods
customer_reviews.text: get this and have fun spending hours with the mods. it was all worth it even though i never even really played the game
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Item was in fairly good condition. Had a slight issue once received but figured it out quickly with help from the customer service which was absolutely incredible. They got back with me quickly and we got things figured out quickly! I would buy from them again and the game works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: They are not kidding with this being a sandbox game. Beautiful landscapes, epic storyline, In depth crafting, and kick ass combat. If you by chance ever are in a bomb shelter during the end of the world this is the game for you. You can while away the days playing while waiting to rise up and kick mutant or zombie but. Plus there is plenty of undead in this to practice on. Joking aside this is a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Padraic Baker

customer_reviews.title: The game is great and like to spend countless hours playing.
customer_reviews.text: I set this up using Steam and it makes it super easy to access. The game is great and like to spend countless hours playing. Definitely getting my monies worth. Actually, Steam will track hours played and I am over 177 hours with so much more game play left.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brockschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Sold me a game that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was sent to me and upon trying to use it I was I formed that the came code had already been activated, this rendering the disc absolutely useless since I could not play the game. I have tried contacting the seller but they have never reached out to me.
customer_reviews.author: THEODORE ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Codes don't work- Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: keep in mind the code for this game will NOT work if it is used. I found out the hard way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased, didn’t work. great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I got the game just as it was described. It didn’t work since the product key was used. I contacted the seller, Jennifer, she was very kind. She gave me a refund, I sent back the game. I’d certainly do business with her again, she is most caring and friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Excellent graphics!
customer_reviews.text: My only wish is for developers to stop making PC games just a port of console games. The menu system is structured like a console game. You can even use a PS3 or Xbox controller to play. I just wish I could custimize the game for keyboard use. Compared to Oblivion, Skyrim is easier to play, especially when switching spells. The graphics are excellent, the voiceovers cover every character you meet. Hours of enjoyment are waiting to be played!
customer_reviews.author: robert amodeo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am so addicted to this game. It is immersive, beautiful, creative, and so much fun. I highly recommend to any RPG or fantasy lovers. This is a must-have classic.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Garrison

customer_reviews.title: SKYRIM Crashed to deaktop
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the game doesn't have all the bugs worked out prior to being pushed into the marketplace. I did get a prompt response from Bethesda on a issue with the game crashing to the desktop. They gave me the steps to rectifie it but that did not work. i reloaded the game, deleted add-ons, MODS etc and the game crashes in the exact same spot, i avoided this quest line on a third try and have had no issues? Other than that the game is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: Good game to play, very addicting. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is because of its dependence on steam to work. If you are offline and steam for some reason logs you out, you can't play the game until you reconnect to the internet. Not a problem in the U.S. (or any other civilized country) but big problem in Afghanistan.
customer_reviews.author: PKO

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Game!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't finished it yet, but this game is really great! It's not done and over with like some of these games, and not problematic either, at least, not that I've seen. I'm not a gaming fanatic, but I truly enjoy this game. It's not as action packed as some others, but rather slower paced which I like. All I have to say is, give it a try, I really think you'll come to love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Radsan

customer_reviews.title: Its from Bethesda
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to dive into this game ever since hearing about it. What the game is missing because it was designed for consoles first and mainly can be made up for by the modding community. Bethesda is one of those software houses that makes it's tools available to the community to keep a game alive. Other pubs should take notice, I'm talking to you Kalypso (tropico devs)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Berrios

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this game
customer_reviews.text: This was my first game of this type. At first, I did my best to go along with the game, but now 9 months later, I am hooked. There is a great main story and lots of side stories. The free modifications available online make it even more stunning to play and look at. Whether you want to play as a good guy or a bad guy, it is up to you. Each situation can be handled in any number of ways.
customer_reviews.author: JeffA2001

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs to play Skyrim
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for father's day. We have it for the xbox, but it's just more fun on the PC. The availability of mods for this game are endless, and that makes the purchase even more worth it. The sky is the limit. It's a decent game overall. With or without mods it is a decent play.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: A Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: for the Elder Scrolls. It plays perfectly on my computor and it has many many hours of play if you fully explore and go into all opportunities presented as you travel Skyrim. I love it. I highly recommend the book that is sold seperately, if you get into a real bind it will be a great help to you as it has been for me.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cavett

customer_reviews.title: YOU neeeeeed this.
customer_reviews.text: If you are just getting into SKYRIM then you will be thrilled that you have one of these sitting at your side. It contains all of the important information you need in order to find your way around this vast empire. I can't imagine playing without this guide as I find it indispensable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom English

customer_reviews.title: Perfection In A Pure Form
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made. Such an amazing game. Definitely recommend using Nexus Mods with it if you want an even more developed immersion and extra fun.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The boys like it
customer_reviews.text: This is another game my boys wanted. They all love it so far. It runs on our old computer and our new one. So that is a good thing for us so our boys aren't fighting who gets to play when. I am a gamer but haven't tried it since I am working so many hours per week I don't get relaxation time
customer_reviews.author: rezack

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and well done
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge game, and I've just cracked the surface of it. I really like that it allows you to play it in any style you like. You can go really in depth doing side missions and developing skills like blacksmith or leather-working, or you can just hack and slash your way through the main quest, the choice is yours. The graphics are beautiful and very smooth, even with the video turned down as I have to on my older box.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B Schwartz-Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Game is better on PC
customer_reviews.text: I started out playing this game on Xbox and I gotta say that the PC version beats it hands down. Especially the Steam Workshop which allows you to add free content to the game. Now many people down play the Steam Workshop as not being modder friendly, but for the user it makes it simpler than downloading from the Nexus.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: What is there to say?
customer_reviews.text: It's Skyrim. A staple in the gaming world. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie and Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Skyrim - Elder Scrolls V
customer_reviews.text: I like these kinds of RPG's. You can take your time and explore the world that has been created. You can follow all of the plot lines and see how the world changes. If you like questing and being challenged, this is the game for you. I only had a few quests that could not be completed - I expect that they had been interrupted somehow and then could not close.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Steam wouldn't let me activate it because it was still activated on another account. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Amrita Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Used Code
customer_reviews.text: Paid for a game that is unusable needs game code that has already been used on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about this game is have to sign up with Steam.com If you got the game for someone without internet they would not be able to enjoy it at all. I had to send the game back because it was not compatible with my laptop, but it is otherwise a great game to get involved with. I have it now for PS3.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow OBrian

customer_reviews.title: Check the product key before buying...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much sucks because the product key was already used. So I paid for a CD box.
customer_reviews.author: Otsuki D. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best games I've ever played. It is so incredibly detailed and intertwined within itself. One of the best things is you can play it as little or as much as you would like and have a great time. My Dad has been playing it basically non-stop for months and still finds new things to do. If you haven't played this game yet, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: The PC version of the game with an x-box controller is perfect in many respects for a RPG. It has virtually hundreds of hours of game play especially with the add ons and should be purchased with the expanded game guide. Sub plots and puzzles abound. Graphics are very good. Housed on Steam the scene changes are instant. These type of changes seem to take quite awhile if you are on x-box.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Must play game.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game, I wish my PC were better equipped to play it. There are hundreds if not thousands of hours of available gameplay, and it can be played in several different directions. Bethesda nails it again, too bad it's the last chapter of the Elder Scrolls.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: Good game, but check vendor fine print - what they don't tell you...
customer_reviews.text: No where in the description is ANYTHING about a) version (vista, XP, Win7) or b) that it's through Steam. Thanks. $20 wasted. Not happy - but I guess buyer beware, right?
customer_reviews.author: sw_mn_chuck

customer_reviews.title: ... out and it to this day is still my favorite. I love that they allow the users to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this game since it came out and it to this day is still my favorite. I love that they allow the users to create content and the game play is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JT DragonFlash

customer_reviews.title: The go-to game for modders and enthusiasts alike
customer_reviews.text: This game is extraordinary in its original form. excellent mechanics open-ended story that Fable seems to lack, and epic final boss (That doesn't end the game) makes this a must for any RPGer. Now add the DLC content and the wealth of incredible mods available by you and everyone around you and you have a game that literally has no end to its possibilities. you may find yourself playing this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Fus Ro Dah
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game. I adore Skyrim. Even if it has some flaws, like every other game, it's still amazing. I've played this game way too much... In all Skyrim is a fun game that you never get bored with, and if somehow you do, you have hundreds of Mods to add to it!
customer_reviews.author: Pea

customer_reviews.title: Action Packed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and my boyfriend will not stop playing the game. I highly recommend for others to purchase this game and try it out for themselves. Tons of action and superb graphics.
customer_reviews.author: ROCKSINGA

customer_reviews.title: The game was a disk
customer_reviews.text: The game was a disk that required a code and it didn't come with the code.
customer_reviews.author: corey marcum

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game because I heard the many positive reviews. The game is awesome and the graphics are gorgeous. The Xbox and PS don't even come close to the graphics. You need a pretty fast PC and video card to take full advantage. Plus most bugs have a patch available to fix. If you do buy this game and have a fast PC, make sure you download the SO MANY....patches, fixes, mods at Steam.
customer_reviews.author: Ladies Man

customer_reviews.title: After trying to get it work on different computers and ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying to get it work on different computers and internet I could not. Amazon allowed me to return it, which I was thankful for. It should not require steam to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious ordering games used
customer_reviews.text: The game had a used activation code. It was unplayable.
customer_reviews.author: Cinders Raven

customer_reviews.title: This is my first real experience with an RPG and this game has proved very impressive.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first real experience with an RPG and this game has proved very impressive. The Steam website has Many individual's add-ons for it of all types! Searching for interesting and helpful additions (free and created by users,) is almost half the fun!
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Skyrim is BOSS
customer_reviews.text: It's not a perfect game, with the crashes on my pc and laptop, but this open ended game has lots of potentials and is fun to play. Steam and Nexus have many addons that can make your experience better. If you like adventure in the days when dragons cast fire upon fearful villagers and taking out the bad guys in caves and castles, well, this is it. Bethesda could have done a better job on the engine, but what can I expect from new recruits that have visions of popsicles and icecream?
customer_reviews.author: Thundarcat

customer_reviews.title: 100+ Hours of play, easily.
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the greatest games on the market to-date. It has tons of replay ability, with hundreds of hours of main and side-quests. When you play on the PC there's also the option to add all sorts of mods to enhance the game further.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Love the game, hate the steam.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games ever. Been playing it on the 360 since it came out....but finally decided that I wanted to play the mods. Unfortunately even tho I have the disk it won't let me install or play it from the disk, I had to install it thru Steam. If I buy the physical disk, I shouldn't have to deal with all the Steam nonsense when I bought the physical game disk.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Curry

customer_reviews.title: Son and Husband love it!
customer_reviews.text: Me, I wish I could play it on a game system because I stink at the keyboard movements, always getting killed because I have my fingers on the wrong keys. But the guys in the house love playing it. Graphics are great, story line interesting...just all around a lot of fun to play (or in my case, watch! ha ha ha!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Elder Scrolls Yet
customer_reviews.text: I've played the Elder scrolls games since Morrowind and this is Awesome. Very big (can keep you busy for a long time) and good graphics. Some of the quests are a little darker than the older games, hence the M rating, but I really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: there was a duplicate cd key for steam and it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Eziothebadass01

customer_reviews.title: Old news - its a great game
customer_reviews.text: BUT to get a good experience out of it you MUST do some "MODS". It's only slightly technical - you need "NMM" the Nexus Mod Manager. Then, go to the nexus site and search on Top 100 downloads of All Time. You really need most of those top 10 listed. I have nearly all of the Top 100 loaded and running fine. Some are not compatible with each other - you must READ some to figure that out. THEN, with the appropriate MODS loaded, this game is incredible! Great! Amazing! BUT, straight out of the box, i.e. "Vanilla" - you will have problems and general suckage. Don't do it that way.
customer_reviews.author: MarcusXL

customer_reviews.title: Mouse detracts, but still fun
customer_reviews.text: It is a typical Elder Scrolls game: lots of detail wrt landscape and plot, lots of variety in ways to play, plenty of quests and treasure. Buggy mouse issues make it a challenge at times, though. If it weren't for the mouse problems, it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie from Holiday

customer_reviews.title: I've had the legendary edition on the Xbox and just wasn't satisfied, but the steam network adds countless hour of ...
customer_reviews.text: This game was meant to be played on the PC, I've had the legendary edition on the Xbox and just wasn't satisfied, but the steam network adds countless hour of extra game-play, which makes this game a steal.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Elder Scrolls: Skyrim
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game! Get a computer that can handle the graphics and you will enter a world of fantasy with remarkable graphics, great characters and challenging quests. The mouse and keyboard moves are easy to execute. The music is mood setting. Steam is no problem and allows fast recall and setting games. Saving multiple games is necessary to get yourself out of many death situations, so that you can return when you are stronger. The quests are well marked to assist your search. Overall, a wonderful way to spend a few hours. WHERE IS ELDER SCROLLS VI?! SKYRIM2!!! AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara A. Finnigan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this game by a friend and after spending an hour playing on his PC I was hooked and purchased my own copy. It's incredible. The graphics are absolutly amazing and the number of quests and size of the "country" and number of things to do in it are truly amazing. It's very interactive. I have put in about 85 hours so far. I don't even feel like I'm half way through the game. I have heard that there are a few bugs in the game but I haven't really run into any yet. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes a single player fantasy role playing game. Well worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: loved it. Countless hours played with mods
customer_reviews.text: First PC game ever bought, loved it. Countless hours played with mods :)
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with a video game
customer_reviews.text: This game is truly as great as everyone says it is. You don't get that very often. And it's even better on the PC than any console. I love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Aether

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted this game, and now that I’ve played it, it was sooooo worth the wait!!!! Literally my favorite RPG game ever.
customer_reviews.author: Rihanna Hollande

customer_reviews.title: It's great that even on the dozenth play through
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a large amount of time on this game over the years that I've owned it. It's great that even on the dozenth play through, there are things I hadn't done before.
customer_reviews.author: Arakinas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, never ending!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great, I have played it earlier, but I never owned the game. I was also at the very end of beating it, the main story line, but never finished. So i had to buy the game, just to finish the main story line. But there is so much to do in the game, you can spend over 300 hours, I have only spent 30, and still not beat the game. With DLC's, the game has even more to do, I can't wait for the Dragonborn DLC to come out!
customer_reviews.author: Vishnu Bhupalam

customer_reviews.title: Not plug and play, but once set up, fun.
customer_reviews.text: We thought we'd slide in the disk, load and play, but there was a lot of horsin' around online before we were able to play. Now that it's set up, hours of fun distraction from life.
customer_reviews.author: SwimMama

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use this item because the code had already been used. Seller LionStar Books.
customer_reviews.author: LET

customer_reviews.title: Everything my daughter wanted
customer_reviews.text: She has been playing this game at friends houses and wanted to have her own now. It is pretty creative and keeps her busy for a long time. For my feeling she has a hard time to finding an end, when time is up.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: I am still playing this game after 2 years and have not done everything it has to offer. Open world, can be anything you want. This is the best RPG I have ever played. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: Like so many other reviews have stated, this is one sweet game. Awesome graphics, great story line, versatile...and so on...the only thing that really bugs me about this game is the number of glitches. I didn't experience any glitches in the main story line; however, some of the interesting side bars, well...there just wasn't any work arounds except one... and that one I had to use a check to end the glitche on one segment of the school of wizardry...but I ran into another....so I started one of the other journeys...wham...another glitche...very disappointing..
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Adventure Game
customer_reviews.text: A great adventure PC game but you will need a modern Video Card. I had to set the game spects at the lowest possible settings to be able to play it. But if you have an up-to-date fair size VC, you will love this game.
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: this game is awesome
customer_reviews.text: omg i love it. the graphics are beautiful, the controls are easy-- this is easily the most awesome game i have ever played.
customer_reviews.author: Neutron88

customer_reviews.title: Great supplier
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy a used game but it arrived in great condition and loaded on my PC with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: There was no code for me to even use the game. It's a useless piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't install
customer_reviews.text: The game code was used already, wouldn't install, I'm returning it. If you buy, buy new, not used
customer_reviews.author: Alex Schodrowski

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍💯💚
customer_reviews.text: OMFG AMAZING GAME , over 200 game awards and I've had it for a while and it's still going strong and consider all the mods u can get to make it look like a game from 2016 , WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever played
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever played. Though I hated the bad things I had to do in order to enjoy more than 75% of the content. Though I was a really good evil guy.
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Horney Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Game perfection.
customer_reviews.text: If you like computerized, deep role-playing games driven heavily by plot and character, you'll love it! If you want a hack and slash mindless game, it's simply okay: get a first person shooter instead.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Persinger

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome Game.
customer_reviews.text: Totally Awesome game, but like anything has its faults. Sad it does but I still love it. Maybe the producers will one day improve on the issues but till then... all we can do is wait.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible on quality PC
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Addicting (if you don't have much of a life). Get into Modding (Skyrim Nexus) & it's an absolutely amazing fantasy immersion.
customer_reviews.author: Chaff

customer_reviews.title: But the disk is nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not include code key for steam !!!!! But the disk is nice !!!!
customer_reviews.author: jason brown

customer_reviews.title: RPG's best title to date
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, have this for the PS3 and loved it but wanted to mod it and upload some gameplay footage to Youtube so got the PC version. I'm annoyed with the whole "being online" thing for playing a single player game.... it requires Steam account in case you weren't aware - would have given 5 but for that fact alone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conti

customer_reviews.title: Elder Scrolls SkyRim  Used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as used for alot less money and it works perfectly. I have played all the previous versions of the Elder Scrolls and this one plays more like the Morrowind .
customer_reviews.author: dark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Product as decribed. Very fun game with lot of freedom.
customer_reviews.author: JohnK

product_meta.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:StandardThe Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is the next installment in the award-winning Elder Scrolls series. Skyrim is the follow up to the 2006 Game of the Year, The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion and the next game from Bethesda Game Studios, creators of the 2008 Game of the Year, Fallout 3.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The next chapter in the highly anticipated Elder Scrolls saga arrives from the makers of the 2006 and 2008 Games of the Year, Bethesda Game Studios. Skyrim reimagines and revolutionizes the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose. 


PUBLISHER: Bethesda Softworks 
DEVELOPER: Bethesda Game Studios
RELEASE DATE: 11/11/11
PLATFORMS: Xbox 360™ / PLAYSTATION®3 /
Games for Windows
GENRE: Role-Playing


Story:
>  The Empire of Tamriel is on the edge. The High King of Skyrim has been murdered. Alliances form as claims to the throne are made. In the midst of this conflict, a far more dangerous, ancient evil is awakened. Dragons, long lost to the passages of the Elder Scrolls, have returned to Tamriel. The future of Skyrim, even the Empire itself, hangs in the balance as they wait for the prophesized Dragonborn to come; a hero born with the power of The Voice, and the only one who can stand amongst the dragons.


KEY FEATURES:
 * 
 * Epic Fantasy Reborn.
   Skyrim reimagines the open-world fantasy epic, pushing the gameplay and technology of a virtual world to new heights.
   
   
   
 * Live another life, in another world.
   Play any type of character you can imagine, and do whatever you want; the legendary freedom of choice, storytelling, and adventure of The Elder Scrolls is realized like never before.
   
   
   
 * All New Graphics and Gameplay Engine.
   Skyrim's new game engine brings to life a complete virtual world with rolling clouds, rugged mountains, bustling cities, lush fields, and ancient dungeons. 
   
   
   
 * You Are What You Play.
   Choose from hundreds of weapons, spells, and abilities. The new character system allows you to play any way you want and define yourself through your actions.
   
   
   
 * Dragons Return.
   Battle ancient dragons like you've never seen. As Dragonborn, learn their secrets and harness their power for yourself.
   

images and screenshots © 2011 ZeniMax Media Inc. All Rights Reserved. About Bethesda Softworks
About Bethesda Softworks: Bethesda Softworks, part of the ZeniMax Media Inc. family of companies, is a premier developer and worldwide publisher of interactive entertainment software. Titles from five of the world’s top development studios – Bethesda Game Studios, id Software, Arkane Studios, Tango Gameworks, and MachineGames – are featured under the Bethesda Softworks label and include such blockbuster franchises as DOOM®, QUAKE®, The Elder Scrolls®, Fallout®, Wolfenstein® and RAGE®. For more information on Bethesda Softworks’ products, visit www.bethsoft.com.
feature_bullets: Skyrim reimagines the open-world fantasy epic, pushing the game play and technology of a virtual world to new heights
Play any type of character you can imagine, and do whatever you want; the legendary freedom of choice, storytelling
Skyrim's new game engine brings to life a complete virtual world with rolling clouds, rugged mountains, bustling cities, lush fields
Choose from hundreds of weapons, spells, and abilities; the new character system allows you to play any way you want
Requires internet connection and free steam account to activate
